site_name: Fosbury House Ferndale RoadLondonSW9 8AX
description: REAR garden with side accessT1 = Large PLANE - Thin crown 20% removing deadwood.  Remove basal and epicormic growth from trunk. Lift to 4m all round and cut back from building ensuring a 3m clearance.T2 = Large PLANE - Thin crown 20% removing deadwood.  Remove basal and epicormic growth from trunk. Lift to 4m all round and cut back from building ensuring a 3m clearance.T3 = 2 x Medium self-sown ELDERS  - Fell as close as possible to ground level and poison stump.T4 = Medium ELDER - cut back from property to give a 2m clearance.T5 = Medium self-sown ASH - Fell as close as possible to ground level and poison stump.
